casebody.data:
Second Department,

November, 1977

(November 15, 1977)* Walter L. Nolechek, Individually and as Administrator, Plaintiff, v Thomas Gesuale et al., Respondents, et al., Defendants. Walter L. Nolechek, Third-Party Plaintiff-Respondent; Paul Neiman et al., Third-Party Defendants-Appellants.

Not published with other decisions of November, 1977, 59 AD2d 885. [Rep.

— Motion by defendants-respondents for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals from an order of this court dated July 25, 1977. Motion by the third-party plaintiff-respondent for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals from an order of this court dated July 25, 1977. Motions for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals granted. In our opinion, questions of law have arisen which ought to be reviewed by the Court of Appeals. The following question is certified: "Was the order of this court dated July 25, 1977, as amended by order dated November 15, 1977, properly made?” Latham, J. P., Rabin, Titone and O’Connor, JJ., concur.
